p: Huludao City (40°56′N, 120°28′E) in the Liaoning Province of China ( S1 Fig) has a temperate monsoon climate with a hot and rainy summer (mean temperature, 23 °C; mean monthly precipitation, 123 mm) and a cold and rainless winter (mean temperature, -5.7 °C; mean monthly precipitation, 2 mm). The city covers 10,434 square km and has a population of 2.6 million people. HFRS has always posed a severe threat to human health in Huludao City since 1984 [ 30]. To control HFRS transmission, mass vaccination campaigns against hantavirus were conducted beginning in 2005, and combined with rat extermination programs during 2005 and 2012 [ 31].
